Class SuperMario

java.lang.Object
SuperMario
public class SuperMario extends Object
Author:
Rodrigo Seer If you have played Super Mario before (Mario from the popular video game series) you know that he has to jump to collect coins Mario can perform actions such as jumping and collecting coins
